About

Pankaj Malhotra aka bitgeeky is a Computer Science student at IIIT-Hyderabad with more than two years of experience with Python and Automation. He is a core Mozilla contributor and mostly works with the Web QA team writing autmated tests for Mozilla Web Projects. He is also a Google Summer of Code Intern with Mozilla working on developing an Automated test suite for one of the projects under Quality Assurance team and researching on various topics related to Functional Testing and Automation. He has been rewarded by Mozilla for his code contribution and active participation. In his free time he likes to Blog and help fellow contributors.

He likes to Open Source his code on GitHub. If you like, you can tip him on Gittip
